data.subject: Best You Ever
data.lyric:
Dearest lover, read this letter
 I can't pretend, I'm still in love
 If my lips could say it better

data.subject: 사랑은 또 이렇게
data.lyric:
봄바람 타고 흐르듯 다가온 사랑은
 다시 말도 없이 떠나고 넌 왜
 내게 아픈 추억들만 남기고 떠나는지
 너를 보냈던 시간들은 내 젖은 맘 속에
 잊지 못 할 너의 이름만 남아서

data.subject: In Memory (2009 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
No one told me the way I should feel
 You left an aching heart
 Lost and lonely, the feeling goes on

data.subject: Angry Heart (2009 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
I still remember how it used to be
 I thought the only thing
 That mattered was me
 You always told

data.subject: Heart Like A Wheel (2009 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
In these days of confusion
 You've turned angry and cold
 You say it's an illusion
 There's no fire

data.subject: Danger Zone (2009 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
Midnight, something don't feel right
 It's been too much, too far away from home
 Hard life, living

data.subject: Seventh Star (2009 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
There's a vision in the sands
 Rising from the ancient past
 Crying let my spirit go
 Lead my burnin

data.subject: Turn To Stone (2009 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
She came from the past
 She was never meant to last
 Her destiny was fatal
 From the start
 A messen

data.subject: No Stranger To Love (2009 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
Cold is the night
 Lonely till dawn
 Cry for the light
 For the love that won't come
 You said that

data.subject: In For The Kill (2009 Remastered Ver.)
data.lyric:
Thunder shattered the dawn
 Raging with fury, the king has come
 The power of terror will reign
 The
